rooms.description: North-facing entrance aligned with Vastu principles; serves as the initial transition from outdoors to the living space.
An open-plan area combining living and kitchen spaces; features traditional Kerala design elements such as wooden beams and tiled floors.
Spacious bedroom with a large balcony overlooking the garden. Designed in traditional Kerala style with intricate wooden carvings.
Spacious bedroom with a large balcony overlooking the garden. Features Kerala-style ventilation and natural lighting.
Master bedroom with an adjoining balcony offering views of the garden; designed to provide privacy while ensuring a connection with nature.
En-suite bathroom for master bedroom; features traditional Kerala-style fixtures and modern amenities.
Balcony space adjacent to the living area that overlooks the garden; integrates with traditional Kerala aesthetics and provides a communal outdoor experience.

openings.description: Door from entrance hall to living area and kitchen; designed for smooth flow of movement.
Window placement ensuring natural light and ventilation while adhering to Vastu principles.
Balcony door connecting the bedroom to its spacious balcony; enhances connectivity with the garden.
Window designed for optimal light and air circulation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Window opening linking the open-plan living area to the balcony for enhanced natural ventilation.
Door providing access from the open-plan area back to the entrance hall.
